text: this is a webinar on conducting a disciplinary investigation. the meeting was about the acas code of practice. the team first discussed the legal background to the topics that they were dealing with. they then discussed the logistics of the investigation process. the final point was that the team should be very careful about the quality of their investigations. the group also discussed how they would make sure that the case was dealt with in a fair way. the professor thought that they should be careful about how they dealt with the case.
